metadata.title: CVE-2016-9606 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: JBoss RESTEasy before version 3.1.2 could be forced into parsing a requestwith YamlProvider, resulting in unmarshalling of potentially untrusted datawhich could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with RESTEasyapplication permissions.

criterions.comment: resteasy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
